actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to restore child's insurance benefits in the case of children who are 18 through 22 years of age and attend postsecondary schools.
short_title: Social Security Child's Insurance Benefits Restoration Act of 2005
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Child's Insurance Benefits Restoration Act of 2005 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors' Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to restore child's insurance benefits in the case of children age 18 through 22 who attend postsecondary schools.

titles.title: Social Security Child's Insurance Benefits Restoration Act of 2005
